articles.title: Facebook Warns 1M Users About Usernames, Passwords Stolen Via Malicious Apps
articles.content:
Meta Platforms Inc's (NASDAQ: META) Facebook has announced that it is going to share details about Facebook users whose accounts may have been compromised due to security issues with various apps downloaded from iOS and Android. 
According to a report, Facebook said that it has identified 400 malicious Android and iOS apps that have targeted users to steal vital login information. 
Facebook will notify close to 1 million users about their account status and how ...
